title: Roundup on Pause ðŸš¨
html:
Hello regens! ðŸ‘‹ Â 

Monty and Anna here, with a little update on the ReFi Roundup! You might have noticed that there was no Roundup published last week. Don't worry, it hasn't vanished into thin air! We're simply hitting the pause button to reflect and ensure that we bring you the absolute best content possible.

We would like to hear from our readers! Whether you've enjoyed the roundup posts in the past or have some constructive feedback to share, please take a moment to fill out this feedback form. ðŸ‘‡

Fill out the Feedback Form

Your input will help us understand your needs and ensure that we continue delivering valuable and enjoyable content.

As we embark on this journey together, your thoughts, suggestions, and feedback are vital. We want to know what resonates with you, what you'd like to see more of, and how we can improve. ðŸ¤—

In the meantime, please feel free to explore our existing content on the blog.

Explore the ReFi DAO Blog

We want to express our deepest gratitude to all the roundup contributors who have been a driving force behind our weekly updates. We appreciate every contribution you've made. ðŸ™Œ

Thank you for being part of this incredible journey. ðŸ’š
